full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 759 Filed 08/10/22 Page 14 of 267 2042 LCACmax1 Brown - direct is admitted. MR. PAGLIUCA: Yes, your Honor. THE COURT: Thank you. MS. MOE: Thank you, your Honor. THE COURT: Jurors may put the binders down and the government may call its next witness. MR. ROHRBACH: The government calls William Brown. THE COURT: William Brown may come forward. WILLIAM BROWN, called as a witness by the Government, having been duly sworn, testified as follows: THE COURT: Thank you, Mr. Brown. You may be seated and you may remove your mask and please state and spell your name for the record. THE WITNESS: Thank you. My name is William Brown, W-i-l-l-i-a-m B-r-o-w-n. THE COURT: Mr. Rohrbach, you may inquire. DIRECT EXAMINATION BY MR. ROHRBACH: Q. Good morning. A. Good morning. Q. Mr. Brown, where do you work? A. I work for the New York State Department of Motor Vehicles, Division of Field Investigations. Q. What is your position there? SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00016230
